wikipedia_page.main:
Lee Colkin (born 15 July 1974) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a defender for Northampton Town and Leyton Orient. He then moved into non-League football to play for 
Hednesford Town, Morecambe, Burton Albion, Grantham Town,Tamworth,Hinckley United,Kettering Town,Hucknall Town,Barwell, Stamford,Ellistown, where he was player-assistant manager, Atherstone Town 
and Stratford Town.
